author: Joe Concha
title: Fox's Hilton urges holdout GOP governors to 'shut things down everywhere'
description: Fox News host Steve Hilton is calling on Republicans governors in nine states who have not issued stay-at-home orders to do so to help slow the spread of the novel coronavirus in an effort to accelerate the return of the...
content:
Fox News host Steve Hilton is calling on Republicans governors in nine states who have not issued stay-at-home orders to do so to help slow the spread of the novel coronavirus in an effort to accelerate the return of the U.S. economy.
"Last week, I said, ope… [+2803 chars]
